eggou.title: Eggou
eggou.content:
Eggou is a bullet hell game, made for the "Newgrounds July Game Jam 2021", with the theme "Egg". It was my first game, there's the itch.io embed game if you want to try!


Welcome to Eggou, a boss fight bullet hell style!

Controls

  • Move: wasd/arrows
  • Shoot: space/enter
  • Back: esc
eggou.description: A flyers chicken shooter, in the bullet hell style.

juicybeat.title: Juicy Beat
juicybeat.description: A rythm game about slice fruits.

newgroundsjs.title: Newgrounds.js
newgroundsjs.content:
Newgrounds.js a javascript library for use Newgrounds.io functions and utilities for your game. You can use with any framework or game engine of Javascript or web tecnologies, like Kaboom.js.

Visit Website

Features

  • Functions with everything your game needs
  • Ability to call all components if you want
  • Use the npm package or use the ES6 module, or a tag script!
newgroundsjs.description: A newgrounds.io api wrapper for Node.js

mandarina.title: Mandarina
mandarina.content:
Mandarina is a little visual novel engine, made with the idea of being a simple. It uses kaboom.js as base, and it's made with JavaScript.

Visit Website

Features

  • Simple verbal language for creating visual novels
  • All in coding, no difficult visual editors
  • Fully customizable
  • Easy to integrate minigames
  • Based in kaboom.js
mandarina.description: A javascript library for creating visual novels.
